snippet: This eight-part series on BBC America tracks two naïve young men on an open-ended vacation among the Maori in the Cook Islands.
abstract: Mike Hale reviews eight-episode series Tatau, starring Theo Barklem-Biggs and Joe Layton, premiering on BBC America.
lead_paragraph: This eight-part series on BBC America tracks two naïve young men on an open-ended vacation among the Maori in the Cook Islands.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Tatau,’ a Pacific Idyll for Dodgy Londoners
headline.print_headline: Going Native? Rule No. 1: Forget the Copycat Tattoo
